sl.sli: ProtobufBuild: The ProtobufBuild operator takes in a tuple of the type generated by spl-schema-from-protobuf script and converts it into a serialized Protobuf record.
ProtobufFileSource: ProtobufFileSource takes in a binary dump of Protobuf records in a common, but strict format.
ProtobufParse: The ProtobufParse operator takes in a serialized Protobuf message and creates a tuple of the type generated by the spl-schema-from-protobuf script.
ProtobufTCPSource: ProtobufTCPSource takes in a binary dump of Protobuf records in a common, but strict format.
